title: STANDPOINT Magazine typefaces
content:
Hi, please help me identify the typefaces used in the magazine STANDPOINT. which was released last May.

thanks  
girish

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013105148im_/http:/typophile.com/files/standpoint_6374.jpg)
author: girish

comments.content:
believe this is wrong forum sub cat...  
also that image is waaaay small, can you get a bigger shot?

Hi Girish,

the serif is [Chronicle](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013105148/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100032).  
F

Hey thanks Florian, actually that is what I was looking to identify.  
thinkDM2, well I was just pointing to the magazine, and was hoping that someone would already know the typeface. Would you point me to the ideal forum to post my kind of question? thanks in advance

Girish
The ideal forum is the Type ID Board: [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013105148/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")
